email_body: no SOblander@carrfut.com on 05/01/2001 11:44:40 AM To: soblander@carrfut.com cc: Subject: Please respond Carr is hosting an enymex presentation at our office in New York this Monday, May 7th from 2-4 PM. We are double checking our head count to make sure that we will be ready for the people attending the presentation. If you would, please reply to this email with a yes or a no to indicate your intentions of attending this enymex presentation. Thank you. Carr Futures 150 S. Wacker Dr., Suite 1500 Chicago, IL 60606 USA Tel: 312-368-6149 Fax: 312-368-2281 soblander@carrfut.com http://www.carrfut.com
